overview: As Rallou (40) visits her parents at the house, imagination and reality interweave comic-tragic situations that give the protagonist laughter but also strength to face the definitive changes that time brings. she grew up in, fantasy and reality create bittersweet situations that make the protagonist smile and give her strength to face the definite changes brought on by time.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: The band moves through our imaginations.
title: Rallou At Home
